channel.title: SkyRidge - Project Insanity 317 Development
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://img265.imageshack.us/img265/6938/skyridgersps.png[/img][/center] [center][b]Try to keep this topic at the top![/b][/center]
[center]Information: Base and Client that i started with: Source: Blank Project Insanity Source Client: Blank Project Insanity Client
UPDATE LOG: [code] 23 May, 2012 Moved Shops Fixed Skillcape Bug -------------------------------- 24 May, 2012 Added Custom Whips Added Custom Patyhat & Mask (With whip interface) Added Stats^ -------------------------------- 25 May, 2012 Added Gnome Agility Course Added Npc Teleport^ [/code]
[b] Key: Green = Done Orange = Working on Red/Black = Haven't Started[/b]
[size=14pt][b]Combat:[/b][/size] -Switching -Player Vs. Player -Player Vs. Npc [b]•Melee[/b] - All weapons [b]•Range[/b] - All Bows - Dark Bow - Crystal Bow Decays
[b]•Magic[/b] - Lunar Magic - Regular Magic - Ancient Magic
[b]•Prayer[/b] - Regular Prayers - Ancient Curses
[b]•Hitpoints[/b] Weapon damage - Poison damage
[size=14pt][b]Skills:[/b][/size]
[b]•Woodcutting[/b] -All tree's chop-able - Bronze Axe - Iron Axe - Steel Axe - Black Axe - Mithril Axe - Adament Axe - Rune Axe - Dragon Axe
[b]•Firemaking[/b] - All Logs Light
[b]•Farming[/b] -Farming Overload Seeds
[b]•Cooking[/b] - All Fish Cookable
[b]•Fishing[/b] - Fishing Guild - All Fish Fishable
[b]•Smithing[/b] - Interface
[b]•Mining[/b] - Improved mining - All Ores - All Pickaxes
[b]•Slayer[/b] - Complete Slayer tower
[b]•Runecrafting[/b] - All runes craftable - Pure essence
[b]•Thieving[/b] - Move stalls to shop area
[b]•Herblore[/b] -Add Overloads (seeds + overload)
[b]•Agility[/b] -Add Gnome Agility Course -Add Wilderness Agility Course
[size=14pt][b]Player:[/b][/size] - Clipped Npc's - Clipped Player Following
[size=14pt][b]Bugs/Dupes Fixed:[/b][/size] - All dupes fixed (as of 5/20/2012) - Skillcape Shop bug
[size=14pt][b]Miscellaneous: [/b][/size] - Add Different Whip Types - Add Black Partyhat - Add Black h'ween mask - Complete Stats on customs - Move shops
[size=24pt][b]Pictures and Videos:[/b][/size]
Gnome Agility Course: http://imageshack.us/clip/my-videos/502/cdyg.mp4/
Player hold's them like a regular whip: [IMG]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/8086/regdwhip.png[/img] Added whip special and interface: [IMG]http://img535.imageshack.us/img535/3934/dwhipinterface.png[/img] Recolor's: [IMG]http://img267.imageshack.us/img267/5870/customs.png[/img]
[i]Please keep in mind, I'm very new to coding rsps. Don't be such a harsh critic on me. I just want to learn by making a project and setting some goals. Feel free to give me some suggestions or tips. I'm going to try to update this as frequently as possible and get some pictures added.[/i]
[/center]

item.title: SkyRidge - Project Insanity 317 Development
item.dc:creator: @_C_oder [C]oder
item.description:
@_C_oder wrote:

[quote=“Sinned, post:7, topic:443134”]Despite seeing PI and custom items, this is quite an interesting development. Nice post layout too, some of these layouts are atrocious. What’s your primary goals?

Looks like you have the potential to turn something deemed as a negative, into a positive, so I hope all goes well.[/quote]
Thank You! I’m hoping to learn a lot from this development and maybe turn it into a public server after i finish the development.

Read full topic

item.title: SkyRidge - Project Insanity 317 Development
item.dc:creator: @Sinned Sinned
item.description:
@Sinned wrote:

Despite seeing PI and custom items, this is quite an interesting development. Nice post layout too, some of these layouts are atrocious. What’s your primary goals?

Looks like you have the potential to turn something deemed as a negative, into a positive, so I hope all goes well.

May wanna fix the colors on your topic though[/quote]

[center]Information:
Base and Client that i started with:
Source: Blank Project Insanity Source
Client: Blank Project Insanity Client

UPDATE LOG:

23 May, 2012
Moved Shops
Fixed Skillcape Bug
--------------------------------
24 May, 2012
Added Custom Whips
Added Custom Patyhat & Mask
(With whip interface)
Added Stats^
--------------------------------
25 May, 2012
Added Gnome Agility Course
Added Npc Teleport^

Key:
Green = Done
Orange = Working on
Red/Black = Haven’t Started

[size=14pt]Combat:[/size]
-Switching
-Player Vs. Player
-Player Vs. Npc
•Melee

  • All weapons
    •Range
  • All Bows
  • Dark Bow
  • Crystal Bow Decays

  • Regular Magic
  • Ancient Magic

  • Ancient Curses

•Hitpoints
Weapon damage

  • Poison damage

•Woodcutting

  • Bronze Axe
  • Iron Axe
  • Steel Axe
  • Black Axe
  • Mithril Axe
  • Adament Axe
  • Rune Axe
  • Dragon Axe

-Farming Overload Seeds

  • All Pickaxes

  • Pure essence

•Herblore
-Add Overloads (seeds + overload)

•Agility
-Add Gnome Agility Course
-Add Wilderness Agility Course

[size=14pt]Player:[/size]

  • Clipped Npc’s
  • Clipped Player Following

[size=14pt]Bugs/Dupes Fixed:[/size]

  • All dupes fixed (as of 5/20/2012)
  • Skillcape Shop bug

[size=14pt]Miscellaneous: [/size]

  • Add Different Whip Types
  • Add Black Partyhat
  • Add Black h’ween mask
  • Complete Stats on customs

[size=24pt]Pictures and Videos:[/size]

Gnome Agility Course:
http://imageshack.us/clip/my-videos/502/cdyg.mp4/

Player hold’s them like a regular whip:

Added whip special and interface:

Recolor’s:

Please keep in mind, I’m very new to coding rsps. Don’t be such a harsh critic on me. I just want to learn by making a project and setting some goals. Feel free to give me some suggestions or tips. I’m going to try to update this as frequently as possible and get some pictures added.

[/center]
